spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script:
Enable('DDR_WAIT', Or(Eq('MDDR_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('FDDR_IN_USE', '1')));\ Tooltip('DDR_WAIT', 'This sets the minimum time interval (in microseconds) between release from reset of the DDR controller blocks and assertion of the DDR_READY output.
The intent of this is to allow time for the DDR memory to be ready for use before accesses to it are attempted.');\ Enable('SDIF0_PCIE', Eq('SDIF0_IN_USE', '1'));\ Enable('SDIF0_PCIE_HOTRESET', And(Eq('SDIF0_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF0_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF0_PCIE_L2P2', And(Eq('SDIF0_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF0_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF1_PCIE', Eq('SDIF1_IN_USE', '1'));\ Enable('SDIF1_PCIE_HOTRESET', And(Eq('SDIF1_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF1_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF1_PCIE_L2P2', And(Eq('SDIF1_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF1_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF2_PCIE', Eq('SDIF2_IN_USE', '1'));\ Enable('SDIF2_PCIE_HOTRESET', And(Eq('SDIF2_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF2_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF2_PCIE_L2P2', And(Eq('SDIF2_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF2_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF3_PCIE', Eq('SDIF3_IN_USE', '1'));\ Enable('SDIF3_PCIE_HOTRESET', And(Eq('SDIF3_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF3_PCIE', '1')));\ Enable('SDIF3_PCIE_L2P2', And(Eq('SDIF3_IN_USE', '1'), Eq('SDIF3_PCIE', '1')));\ Tooltip('DEVICE_VOLTAGE', 'The device voltage affects the RC oscillator clock frequency: 1.0 V -> 25 MHz RC oscillator clock 1.2 V -> 50 MHz RC oscillator clock');\

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: If POWER_ON_RESET_N or RESET_N_M2F is asserted

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:description: Facilitiates sequencing of reset signals in a SmartFusion2 device.
